headline: MetLife’s Massive Annuity Risk Transfer Could Be A Game Changer For MetLife (MET)
summary: MetLife recently transferred US$10.00 billion in variable annuity risk to Talcott Resolution and has been highlighted among leading life insurers, even as analysts point to slow premium growth, weaker earnings momentum, and sector pressures from falling interest rates. This combination of risk reduction in legacy businesses and concerns over declining book value and softer investment income paints a mixed picture for MetLife’s long-term positioning. Next, we’ll examine how concerns over slow...
